{
    "formKey": "{{formKey}}",
    "locale":"en",
    "IsFinalized": true,
    "HostedPageUrl":"",
    "fields": {
        "{{textboxElement_Key}}": "test",
        "{{textareaElement_Key}}":"Form contains textarea element and element is required. Submit form which enter value to the element.",
        "{{numberElement_Key}}":"test",
        "{{rangeElement_Key}}":11,
        "{{urlElement_Key}}":"test",
        "{{selectionElement_Key}}":"test",
        "{{choiceElement_Key}}":"10",
        "{{imageChoiceElement_Key}}":"test"
    }
}

{
    "formKey": "{{formKey}}",
    "locale":"en",
    "IsFinalized": true,
    "HostedPageUrl":"",
    "fields":{
        "{{textboxKey}}":"Dien Bien",
        "{{textareaKey}}":"Dien Bien Phu may be one of Vietnam's best kept travel secrets - especially for those with an interest in history. There's more than history too. The surrounding countryside is beautiful and inhabited by diverse ethnic minorities. It's also an excellent base for travel into less-visited northern Laos.",
        "{{numberKey}}": 1954,
        "{{urlKey}}": "https://www.rustycompass.com/vietnam-travel-guide-233/dien-bien-phu-17",
        "{{selectionKey}}":1,
        "{{choiceKey}}":1,
        "{{imageKey}}": "{{url}}/globalassets/alloy-meet/alloymeet.png"
    }
}

body.raw:
{
    "formKey": "{{formKey}}",
    "locale":"en",
    "IsFinalized": true,
    "HostedPageUrl":"",
    "fields":{
        "{{textboxKey}}":"Dien Bien",
        "{{textareaKey}}":"Dien Bien Phu may be one of Vietnam's best kept travel secrets - especially for those with an interest in history. There's more than history too. The surrounding countryside is beautiful and inhabited by diverse ethnic minorities. It's also an excellent base for travel into less-visited northern Laos.",
        "{{numberKey}}": 1954,
        //"{{rangeKey}}":10,
        "{{urlKey}}": "https://www.rustycompass.com/vietnam-travel-guide-233/dien-bien-phu-17",
        "{{selectionKey}}":1,
        "{{choiceKey}}":1,
        "{{imageKey}}": "{{url}}/globalassets/alloy-meet/alloymeet.png",
        "{{fileUploadKey}}": "abc.png"
    }
}
